com.se.simplicity.picking.event
Class PickEvent

java.lang.Object
  com.se.simplicity.picking.event.PickEvent

public class PickEvent
extends java.lang.Object

An event that indicates a Picker has been invoked against a SceneGraph (a SceneGraph has been picked) and contains the hits made as a result of this pick.

Author:
Gary Buyn
